title: Girl's jacket
description: front panels of solid black and purple with embroidered appliqué at front opening and collar and additional appliqué panels descending from each shoulder; front opening appliqué has curved embroidery in orange and green with horizontal fabric stripes in yellow, orange, pink and black with green corduroy panels at bottom of appliqué; shoulder panels of appliqué with metallic inserts in design; upper sleeves with horizontal wide stripes in red and yellow and band of narrow multicolored stripes; lower sleeves have wide panel of three-color batik of various designs and cuff of plain fabric; back of jacket--squared-off letter U-shaped appliqué with embroidery and metallic inserts; triangular appliqué panels on either side of pocket flaps with embroidery and metallic inserts; flared hem with wide border of narrow striped appliqué; side pockets
creditline: The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
